content: I'll definitely check out those recommendations. I'm excited to explore the indie and alternative scene. By the way, do you think it's a good idea to also start collecting vinyl records from other decades, like the 60s, 70s, and 80s? I already have some rare finds from those eras, like my mint condition copy of The Beatles' "Sgt. Pepper's Lonely Hearts Club Band" and a limited edition pressing of Fleetwood Mac's "Rumours".
